completeSnapshot.description: Grants permission to seal and complete the snapshot after all of the required blocks of data have been written to it

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on tag key-value pairs assigned to the AWS resource

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a tag key and value pair that is allowed in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on tag key-value pairs assigned to the AWS resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by a list of tag keys that are allowed in the request

ebs:Description.description: Filters access by the description of the snapshot being created

ebs:ParentSnapshot.description: Filters access by the ID of the parent snapshot

ebs:VolumeSize.description: Filters access by the size of the volume for the snapshot being created, in GiB

getSnapshotBlock.description: Grants permission to return the data of a block in an Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS) snapshot

listChangedBlocks.description: Grants permission to list the blocks that are different between two Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS) snapshots of the same volume/snapshot lineage
